Title: Falana warns of Canadian court’s terrorist label impact on APC, PDP
Summary: Falana warns of Canadian court’s terrorist label impact on APC, PDP   By Yetunde Ayobami Ojo . Human rights lawyer and Senior Advocate of Nigeria (SAN), Femi Falana, has warned that the recent Canadian court judgment classifying Nigeria's two parties as terrorists .

Title: One in three teachers in Nigeria lacks proper qualifications –UBEC
Summary: One in three teachers in Nigeria’s basic schools is unqualified, according to new data . Figures released by the Universal Basic Education Commission (UBEC) for 2022/23 show that only two of the teachers lack proper qualifications .

Title: Prof. Ize-Iyamu becomes first female, dentist appointed CMD of UBTH
Summary: Prof. Idia Ize-Iyamu becomes first female, dentist appointed CMD of UBTH . She is the first woman and the first dentist to lead the 52-year-old institution .

Title: FCTA targets criminal hideouts as shanty clearance resumes in Abuja
Summary: Federal Capital Territory Administration (FCTA) has begun a renewed clearance of shanties in Abuja . FCTA cites security concerns and obstruction of developmental projects in the city centre .

Title: Thor Explorations announces $11.5m budget, new gold intersections at Segilola mine
Summary: Thor Explorations Ltd. has announced the allocation of an $11.5 million exploration budget for 2025 . New high-grade gold mineralisation intersections at the Segilola gold mine in Osun State, Nigeria .

Title: US revokes 6,000 students’ visas
Summary: The top US diplomat told reporters that he was revoking visas daily . He said: "Every time I find one of these lunatics, I take away their visas"

Title: JAMB gives tertiary institutions end-of-year deadline for 2025 admissions
Summary: Joint Admissions and Matriculation Board (JAMB) has issued a directive to all tertiary institutions in Nigeria to complete their 2025 admission processes before the end of the year .

Title: 84th birthday: IBB remains a patriot, visionary, selfless leader – Bode George
Summary: Former Deputy National Chairman of the PDP, Chief Olabode Ibiyinka George, felicitated former Military President, General Ibrahim Badamosi Babangida . George described IBB as a patriot, visionary and selfless leader .

Title: 65th NBA Conference: NSITF boss, Faleye speaks on social insurance to lawyers
Summary: Barr. Olúwawaṣeu Faleye is expected to be the lead speaker at the breakout session lV at the Nigerian Bar Association, NBA 65th annual conference in Enugu from Monday 25th August . This was disclosed in a statement by the Corporate Corporate .

Title: We’ve eliminated unregistered SIMs from Nigeria’s telecoms network – NCC
Summary: NCC says it can’t control names attached to SIMs Soni Daniel & Emma UJah Abuja . The development can boost national and cyber security, says NCC .
